articles.title: Vinesh Phogat shares letter seeking additional time and not exemption from Asian Games trials - mid-day.com
articles.description: Vinesh Phogat posted an undated letter on social media to prove that the six protesting wrestlers did not demand exemption from Asian Games trials
articles.content: Vinesh Phogat on Sunday posted an undated letter on social media to prove that the six protesting wrestlers did not demand exemption from Asian Games trials but sought only time till August for prepa… [+3290 chars]
